==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|weibl.|w.||abbreviations}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wīplich}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wīblīh}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*wībalīkaz}}, equivalent to {{suffix|de|Weib|lich}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|wijfelijk}}, {{cog|en|wifely}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvaɪ̯plɪç/}} * {{audio|de|De-weiblich.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|-}} # [[female]] #: {{ux|de|Sie gehört dem '''weiblichen''' Geschlecht an.|She belongs to the '''female''' sex.}} # {{lb|de|grammar}} [[feminine]] ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|männlich}}, {{l|de|sächlich}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[feminine]], [[womanly]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|weiblich|weiblicher|weiblichst}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|männlich}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|verweiblichen}} * {{l|de|Weiblichkeit}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Weib}} * {{l|de|Weibchen}} * {{l|de|Weiblein}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈvaɪ̯pliç/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|hrx|adjective|comparative|weiblicher|superlative|weiblichst}} # [[female]] # [[feminine]] ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Pennsylvania German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pdc|goh|wīblīh}}.
